price: i reci: “Tebi se ja, Gospodaru moj, obraćam za zaštitu od priviđenja šejtanskih,
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
